name: Experobot
0:
”Alexa, ask experobot to start cleaning.”
”Alexa, ask experobot to stop cleaning.”
”Alexa, ask experobot to start auto cleaning.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: experobot
des:
Want an automatic cleaner for floor or carpets? Just speak up! Experobot vacuum cleaner is able to be controlled by speaker. To get started, make sure you have “Experobot” and “Alexa” APP ready for operation in your phone. Then, you just need to enable the “ Experobot” skill by clicking on the “Enable” button at the top of this screen. Once the skill is enabled, you will be asked to link with your “Experobot” account. 
 
When all connection is ready built, you can simply control robot by saying: 
“Alexa, ask experobot to start cleaning.”
“Alexa, ask experobot to stop cleaning.”
“Alexa, ask experobot to start charging.”
“Alexa, ask experobot to start edge cleaning.”
“Alexa, ask experobot to start area cleaning.”
“Alexa, ask experobot to start auto cleaning.”
“Alexa, ask experobot for his status.” 

Tips: you must firstly bind your robot vacuum cleaner with “Experobot” APP to use the Alexa voice control. 
Please make sure to use your “Experobot” account to link Alexa-skill. 
If you have any questions, feel free to contact us: support@cloudsbot.com.
